roleset.name: supply with feathers, make ready for flight

example.name: fledge-v
example.text: John fledged the arrow with pigeon feathers.

roleset.note: FLEDGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'fledge' based on the usage in ULA written and comparison with 'ready'. No VerbNet entry. (from fledge.01-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: raise a baby bird until it can leave the nest, and metaphorical development extension

example.name: fledge-v
example.text: Dates for 4 broods ranged from 19 May to 7 August (brood partially fledged).

example.name: fledged-j: Modern usage
example.text: The chemical conversion in any full-fledged ecosystem is impressive.

example.name: fledging-n
example.text: Plus the nine other chicks marked with radiotransmitters, died at around the time of fledging.

roleset.note: FLEDGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'fledge' based on the usage in ULA written and comparison with 'ready'. No VerbNet entry. (from fledge.01-v predicate notes)
